feed.title: Snubs
feed.subtitle: Film nerds and hosts, Caroline Young and Chris Masciarelli, discuss their favorite films snubbed at the Oscars. Alternating each week, one host must convince the other of their favorite films' deserved nomination. They discuss Oscar films and their competitive awards years, while also trying to make each other laugh.

author.name: High Tops Media & Caroline Young, Chris Masciarelli

entry.title: Se7en - Season 1 Episode 38
entry.content:
On Snubs, film fans and co-hosts, Caroline Young and Chris Masciarelli, discuss their favorite films that were snubbed by the Oscars. On this episode, our titular hosts discuss David Fincher’s Se7en, and the 1996 Academy Awards it was noticeably absent from. Caroline wants David Fincher to direct every movie and Chris just wants to know WHAT’S IN THE BOX?

Don’t forget to follow on Instagram!
https://www.instagram.com/snubspod/

A High Tops Media Podcast
You can follow for more High Tops Media content on Facebook, Instagram, and Twitter: @hightopsmedia
Check out more podcasts on our website https://hightops.media

entry.title: Planes, Trains and Automobiles - Season 1 Episode 37

link.title: Planes, Trains and Automobiles - Season 1 Episode 37

entry.content:
On Snubs, film fans and co-hosts, Caroline Young and Chris Masciarelli, discuss their favorite films that were snubbed by the Oscars. On this episode, our titular hosts, along with special guest Susan Masciarelli (Chris’ mom), discuss John Hughes’ Planes, Trains and Automobiles, and the 1988 Academy Awards it was noticeably absent from. Caroline has some questions about Del’s living situation, Chris could not be happier to be here, and Susan is the #1 friend of the pod.

Don’t forget to follow on Instagram!
https://www.instagram.com/snubspod/

A High Tops Media Podcast
You can follow for more High Tops Media content on Facebook, Instagram, and Twitter: @hightopsmedia
Check out more podcasts on our website https://hightops.media

entry.title: The Skeleton Twins - Season 1 Episode 36
entry.content:
On Snubs, film fans and co-hosts, Caroline Young and Chris Masciarelli, discuss their favorite films that were snubbed by the Oscars. On this episode, our titular hosts discuss Craig Johnson’s The Skeleton Twins, and the 2015 Academy Awards it was noticeably absent from. Caroline has a sweatshirt from an iconic moment from this film, and Chris sent a ridiculous Halloween text you just have to hear to believe.

Don’t forget to follow on Instagram!
https://www.instagram.com/snubspod/

entry.title: Halloween (+ Montclair Film Festival Recap) - Season 1 Episode 35

link.title: Halloween (+ Montclair Film Festival Recap) - Season 1 Episode 35

entry.content:
On Snubs, film fans and co-hosts, Caroline Young and Chris Masciarelli, discuss their favorite films that were snubbed by the Oscars. On this episode, our titular hosts discuss John Carpenter’s Halloween and the 1979 Academy Awards it was noticeably absent from. But first, they will be joined by Ana Tressel to discuss their weekend at the Montclair Film Festival where they screened Glass Onion: A Knives Out Mystery, Armageddon Time, The Good Nurse, and The Whale. Caroline thought Michael Meyers was the same person as Mike Myers in her youth, Chris likes to set an atmospheric scene when talking about Halloween, and Ana shares her Daniel Craig/Knives Out impression with our audience.

Don’t forget to follow on Instagram!
https://www.instagram.com/snubspod/

A High Tops Media Podcast
You can follow for more High Tops Media content on Facebook, Instagram, and Twitter: @hightopsmedia
Check out more podcasts on our website https://hightops.media

entry.title: A Quiet Place - Season 1 Episode 34
entry.content:
On Snubs, film fans and co-hosts, Caroline Young and Chris Masciarelli, discuss their favorite films that were snubbed by the Oscars. On this episode, our titular hosts, along with special guest Surina Belk-Gupta, discuss John Krasinski’s A Quiet Place, and the 2019 Academy Awards it was noticeably absent from. Caroline is notorious for screaming during horror movies, Chris would have been taken out by the monsters immediately if this was real, and Surina saw the sequel to A Quiet Place 6 times in the theater.

Don’t forget to follow on Instagram!
https://www.instagram.com/snubspod/

A High Tops Media Podcast
You can follow for more High Tops Media content on Facebook, Instagram, and Twitter: @hightopsmedia
Check out more podcasts on our website https://hightops.media

entry.title: It (Chapter One) - Season 1 Episode 33
entry.content:
On Snubs, film fans and co-hosts, Caroline Young and Chris Masciarelli, discuss their favorite films that were snubbed by the Oscars. On this episode, our titular hosts discuss Andrés Muschietti’s film adaptation of Stephen King’s It (Chapter One), and the 2018 Academy Awards it was noticeably absent from. Caroline has a funny story surrounding another 2017 release, Call Me By Your Name, and Chris is on gazebos, even though they’re bullshit.

Don’t forget to follow on Instagram!
https://www.instagram.com/snubspod/

entry.title: The Cabin in the Woods - Season 1 Episode 32

link.title: The Cabin in the Woods - Season 1 Episode 32

entry.content:
On Snubs, film fans and co-hosts, Caroline Young and Chris Masciarelli, discuss their favorite films that were snubbed by the Oscars. On this episode, our titular hosts discuss Drew Goddard’s The Cabin in the Woods, and the 2012 Academy Awards it was noticeably absent from. Caroline would’ve killed Chris if it meant saving the world, and Chris wishes Hemsworth would’ve blown the conch. They both would be down to write the prequel.

Don’t forget to follow on Instagram!
https://www.instagram.com/snubspod/

A High Tops Media Podcast
You can follow for more High Tops Media content on Facebook, Instagram, and Twitter: @hightopsmedia

entry.title: The Nice Guys - Season 1 Episode 31
entry.content:
On Snubs, film fans and co-hosts, Caroline Young and Chris Masciarelli, discuss their favorite films that were snubbed by the Oscars. On this episode, our titular hosts, along with special guest Jai Singh Nanda, discuss Shane Black’s The Nice Guys, and the 2017 Academy Awards it was noticeably absent from. Caroline should’ve been in the marketing department for this film, Chris still doesn’t know the difference between a lead and a supporting character, and Jai didn’t know Peter Sellers died in the 80s.

Don’t forget to follow on Instagram!
https://www.instagram.com/snubspod/

A High Tops Media Podcast
You can follow for more High Tops Media content on Facebook, Instagram, and Twitter: @hightopsmedia
Check out more podcasts on our website https://hightops.media

entry.title: Blade Runner - Season 1 Episode 30
entry.content:
On Snubs, film fans and co-hosts, Caroline Young and Chris Masciarelli, discuss their favorite films that were snubbed by the Oscars. On this episode, our titular hosts discuss Ridley Scott’s, Blade Runner, and the 1983 Academy Awards it was noticeably absent from. Caroline thinks Harrison Ford is for the girls and Chris is upset over the eye gouging scenes. They both actually have an intelligent conversation as well, which is a first.

Don’t forget to follow on Instagram!
https://www.instagram.com/snubspod/

A High Tops Media Podcast
You can follow for more High Tops Media content on Facebook, Instagram, and Twitter: @hightopsmedia
Check out more podcasts on our website https://hightops.media

entry.title: Emmys 2022 Recap - Season 1 Episode 29
entry.content:
On Snubs, film fans and co-hosts, Caroline Young and Chris Masciarelli, usually discuss their favorite films that were snubbed by the Oscars. On this special episode, our titular hosts recap the 2022 Emmys, and the surprise moments everyone can’t stop talking about. They also discuss some of the shows nominated, and which series and stars may have been snubbed this year. They recorded right after the show, so are both tired but excited to talk about one of their favorite events of the year. Chris could not be more happy for Michael Keaton, and Caroline believes Bill Hader was robbed.

Don’t forget to follow on Instagram!
https://www.instagram.com/snubspod/

A High Tops Media Podcast
You can follow for more High Tops Media content on Facebook, Instagram, and Twitter: @hightopsmedia
Check out more podcasts on our website https://hightops.media
